AI Description: CyToolz is a "cythonized" version of the Toolz library, providing high performance utility functions for iterables, functions, and dictionaries in Python. It offers a set of functional tools for iterators that extends the itertools module with additional functions.
Core Features: - High Performance Utility Functions For Iterables, Functions, & Dictionaries, - Extends The Itertools Module With Additional Functions, - Improved Performance Through Cython Optimization
General Tags: Python Library, Functional Programming, Utility Functions
